trans-unit.source: Click **Sign In**, and then enter the credentials for your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: Click **Sign In**, and then enter the credentials for your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: This method is quicker and easier, but if you use this method you won't be able to see Azure SQL Database or Mobile Services in the **Server Explorer** window.
trans-unit.target: This method is quicker and easier, but if you use this method you won't be able to see Azure SQL Database or Mobile Services in the **Server Explorer** window.

trans-unit.source: Click **Manage subscriptions** in order to install a management certificate that enables access to your account.
trans-unit.target: Click **Manage subscriptions** in order to install a management certificate that enables access to your account.

trans-unit.source: In the **Manage Azure Subscriptions** dialog box, click the **Certificates** tab, and then click **Import**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Manage Azure Subscriptions** dialog box, click the **Certificates** tab, and then click **Import**.

trans-unit.source: Follow the directions to download and import a subscription file (also called a *.publishsettings* file) for your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: Follow the directions to download and import a subscription file (also called a *.publishsettings* file) for your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to Connect to Azure from Visual Studio](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=324796).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [How to Connect to Azure from Visual Studio](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=324796).
